TelemetryDefinition.Name: MemberTrends
TelemetryDefinition.Description: This chart provides a set of streams indicating a single project member's DevTime, Build counts, Unit Test invocations, Commits, and Churn. Data is non-cumulative over time.

TelemetryDefinition.Name: ProductTrends
TelemetryDefinition.Description: This chart provides a set of streams indicating Coverage, Size, Churn, Commit, UnitTest, Build, and DevTime. All data is non-cumulative.
